trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked delete (all v) of [rows v] set [black cards total v] to [0] set [row number v] to [1] ask [How many rows would you like to enter?] and wait set [number of rows v] to (answer) repeat (number of rows) ask (join [Enter row ] (row number)) and wait add (answer) to [rows v] change [row number v] by (1) end set [index row v] to [1] repeat (length of [rows v] :: list) set [index v] to [1] repeat (length of (item (index row) of [rows v] :: list)) if <(letter (index) of (item (index row) of [rows v] :: list)) = [B]> then change [black cards total v] by (1) end change [index v] by (1) end if <((black cards total) mod (2)) = [1]> then say (join [There is a parity error in row ] (index row)) for (3) secs end set [black cards total v] to [0] change [index row v] by (1) end
